content: I've been having some issues with the showerhead in our bathroom for the past few weeks, and I think it's time to replace it. Do you have any recommendations for a good showerhead that can improve water pressure? By the way, I recently reorganized the cabinet under the sink to make it more efficient, and it's been a game-changer - I threw away some old toiletries and got new storage bins for my skincare products and hair accessories.
